thread.title: A$AP Bari Gives Us an Exclusive Tour of the VLONE x Nike Air Force 1 Pop-Up
thread.title_full: A$AP Bari Gives Us an Exclusive Tour of the VLONE x Nike Air Force 1 Pop-Up

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: A$AP Bari Gives Us an Exclusive Tour of the VLONE x Nike Air Force 1 Pop-Up
text:
Just days ago we provided you with an initial glimpse inside the Nike Air Force 1 x VLONE pop-up shop in Harlem . Now we’re diving deeper by highlighting a closer look at the space, courtesy of A$AP Bari himself, as well as what went down during the much-hyped NYFW event.
As expected, the pop-up event was a who’s who in attendance, with appearances from the likes of PlayBoi Carti, Jerry Lorenzo, Shaun Ross, Paloma Elsesser, Winnie Harlow, Big Sean, Adrienne Ho, Aluna George, Anna Trevelyan, Brenmar, Aleali May, and more. A$AP Ferg was also on-hand for A$AP Bari’s soiree, as he let loose of a performance, while Virgil Abloh in turn provided some additional fire tunes while DJing.
For a look at what all went down, see the on-hand imagery below, and for a tour of the space courtesy of Bari himself, press play on the video above.
